@Plastic_EU @EnvAgency ¬£185 a year?? I felt extravagant spending 50 quid last year to expand our deccies collection. Using the same ones as last year isn't "re-using", it's just using! That's like saying I re-used yesterday's coat.

@RussellB1ggs @EnvAgency @N_Rivers_Trust Our situation is long running but progress has been made, I just have to keep fighting to get the remaining defects fixed.  The EA are just a tad reluctant at present regarding the outstanding defects.  They keep trying to offload the investigation onto the local Council.

Chaired by Jack Rosenthal, a keen local fisherman. Presentation + Q&A Via Zoom on 15 Dec at 6pm https://t.co/qc10fQykA0
#Suffolk #Science #fishing #naturelovers https://t.co/JGDWudEDO0
